mapper.update: UPDATE User SET user_name = #{user_name:VARCHAR}, user_token = #{user_token:VARCHAR}, user_sex = #{user_sex:INTEGER}, user_birthday = #{user_birthday:VARCHAR}, user_age = #{user_age:INTEGER}, user_grant = #{user_grant:VARCHAR}, user_lastlogin = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE user_no = #{user_no:INTEGER};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM User WHERE user_no = #{user_no} AND user_del_check = FALSE;

SELECT u.user_no, u.user_email, u.user_name, u.user_sex, u.user_birthday, u.user_age, u.user_lastlogin, i.img_name, i.img_path, i.img_purpose, i.img_extension, ugi.uginfo_level, ugi.uginfo_experience, ugi.uginfo_gold, ugi.uginfo_active_score FROM User u RIGHT JOIN (SELECT * FROM Image WHERE img_type = 'user_profile' AND img_type_no = #{user_no:INTEGER}) i ON u.user_no = i.img_type_no LEFT JOIN Usergameinfo ugi ON u.user_no = ugi.user_no WHERE user_del_check = FALSE;
